name: Fashion Girl Salon: Glam Doll Makeover Girls Games
name_original: Fashion Girl Salon: Glam Doll Makeover Girls Games
description:
Glamor! Fashion! Makeup and models! Glam Doll Makeover the game is spa, Makeover,Makeup & Dressup
The perfect Makeover game for girls. Create exciting hot new looks and show off your sense of style and fashion doll with this awesome Makeover games with Spa,makeup and dress.
Help her get ready by choosing out a new outfit, new clothes, trendy shoes, bags, dresses, makeup and more! In Fashion Doll salon getting ready to go for her Fashion Show.
Once your American models are dressed, it's time to apply glam makeup! Pick the best colors makeup tools and add them with the touch screen, Pick an amazing hairdo and you're ready for a Fashion Model Makeover out on the town!
Features: - Design the best fashions for Glam Doll. - Pick outfits, hair and makeup for glam girl. - Add accessories such as shoes, jewellery and purse,earrings,neckless and Fashinable Dresses etc.
